title: Unprecedented privacy risk with popular health apps

title_detail.value: Unprecedented privacy risk with popular health apps

summary: Researchers call for greater regulation and transparency as analysis of medicines-related apps found most directly shared user data -- including sensitive health data -- with third parties, posing an unprecedented privacy risk.

summary_detail.value: Researchers call for greater regulation and transparency as analysis of medicines-related apps found most directly shared user data -- including sensitive health data -- with third parties, posing an unprecedented privacy risk.
